General.Name: Jee Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Jee Technology Co., Ltd. provides solutions for automotive intelligent manufacturing equipment and new energy vehicle e-drive systems. Its solutions cover intelligent equipment, such as BIW intelligent connection, powertrain intelligent A&T, and battery intelligent A&T production lines, as well as industrial internet; and e-drive systems comprising BEV e-drive system. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Hefei, China.
